items.name: Template_DataScrollView
items.content:
ui.UiFactory.customTypes["ui.DataScrollView"] = {
    "type": "ui.FreeLayout",
    "clipRect": true,
    "controls": [
        {
            "type": "ui.ScrollBar",
            "frame": [0, 0, 15, "100%"],
            "updateBehavior": "continuous",
            "formulas": [
                $ -> 
                    o.numbers[0] = o.numbers[0] or 0
                    if o.parent.controls[1].scrollableHeight > 0 and o.numbers[0] != o.controls[0].dstRect.y
                        o.numbers[0] = o.controls[0].dstRect.y
                        o.parent.controls[1].scrollOffsetY = o.controls[0].dstRect.y / (o.parent.dstRect.height - o.controls[0].dstRect.height) * o.parent.controls[1].scrollableHeight
                    if o.parent.controls[1].scrollableHeight > 0 then o.controls[0].dstRect.height = Math.max(o.parent.dstRect.height / o.parent.controls[1].contentHeight * o.parent.dstRect.height, 30)
                    o.visible = false if o.parent.controls[1].scrollableHeight <= 0                
                    o.visible = true if o.parent.controls[1].scrollableHeight > 0 
                
            ],
            "margin": [0, 0, 0, 0],
            "alignmentX": "right"
        },
        {
            "type": "ui.DataGrid",
            "id": "mygrid",
            "formulas": [
                $ ->
                    o.numbers[0] = o.numbers[0] or 0
                    if o.numbers[0] != o.scrollOffsetY
                        o.numbers[0] = o.scrollOffsetY
                        o.parent.controls[0].controls[0].dstRect.y = o.scrollOffsetY / o.scrollableHeight * (o.dstRect.height - o.parent.controls[0].controls[0].dstRect.height)
                        o.parent.controls[0].numbers[0] = o.parent.controls[0].controls[0].dstRect.y
                
            ],
            #"bindings": [{ "event": { "onChange": "o.scrollOffsetY" }, "sourceField": "o.scrollOffsetY", "targetField": "o.parent.controls[0].controls[0].dstRect.y", "convertRatio": { "source": "o.scrollableHeight", "targetSize": "o.parent.controls[0].controls[0].dstRect.height", "offset": 0, "target": "o.dstRect.height" }, "breakChain": ["o.parent.controls[0]"] }],
            "frame": [0, 0, "100%", "100%"],
            "template": -> p.template
            "dataSource": -> p.dataSource
            "spacing": -> p.spacing
            "columns": -> p.columns ? 1
        }
    ]
}
